name: Rescate 2019: Primera Parte
overview: Year 2019-THE FUTURE The human race has expanded by the galaxy. The outer space has opened a new horizon for explorers, scientists and merchants. Also for smugglers, pirates and evaded of justice. The ganymede, a small intergalactic ship that is a little dedicated to everything, according to circumstances and the need, is stranded on a distant planet in which several crew have disappeared.
